story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasure of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Loras Tyrell to seek help. Loras Tyrell was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at Night, Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and they immediately became friends. Finally in Winterfell at Night, Margaery Tyrell faced Petyr Baelish. With the help of Mace Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Petyr Baelish. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the treasure and in Saltpans celebrated with Mace Tyrell by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a squire. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the House of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Daenerys Targaryen to seek help. Daenerys Targaryen was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Ruby Ford at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen were almost in The Dreadfort, when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen celebrated in White Harbor by playing a game.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a hunter. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Cassana Baratheon, got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in Seagard at Christmas, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the first day of Spring Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon were almost in Seagard, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the freedom was not under threat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon celebrated in Great Sept of Baelor by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of mind controlling. During a long training session in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Dreadfort at Christmas, Petyr Baelish faced Arya Stark. With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Arya Stark. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Winterfell and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the freedom of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Ygritte to seek help. Ygritte was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Bear Island at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Jon Snow and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Jon Snow finally found Petyr Baelish in Moat Cailin. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the freedom and in Winterfell celebrated with Jon Snow by listening to a storytelling.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help. Robert Arryn was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Deepwood Motte, when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the treasure and in Torrhen's Square celebrated with Lysa Arryn by getting married.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Benjen Stark to seek help. Benjen Stark was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Winterfell at the first day of Spring, Daenerys Targaryen met Daario Naharis and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Daario Naharis finally found Robert Baratheon in Torrhen's Square. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Daario Naharis celebrated in Castle Black by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened the freedom of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Lyarra Stark, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of military strategy. In The Trident at the first day of Spring, Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaella Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At sunrise Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaella Targaryen were almost in Oldstones, when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaella Targaryen went to Bear Island and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a murderer. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of fire sorcery. In Kings Landing at the Summer Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. At Night Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Karhold, when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the treasure and in Red Keep celebrated with Lysa Arryn by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a revolutionary. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Stannis Baratheon to seek help. Stannis Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at the Winter Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they immediately became friends. At the Autumnal Equinox Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in The Ruby Ford, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the peace and in Deepwood Motte celebrated with Gendry by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a soldier. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the castle of Jon Snow. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rhaenys Targaryen, Jon Snow learnt the power of invisibility. In The Dreadfort at the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Aerys II Targaryen and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Aerys II Targaryen finally found Arya Stark in The Twins. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Arya Stark. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the castle and in The Ruby Ford celebrated with Aerys II Targaryen by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Targaryen. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the jewel of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Rhaella Targaryen to seek help. Rhaella Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in White Harbor at sunrise, Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Rhaegar Targaryen finally found Margaery Tyrell in The Ruby Ford. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen went to The Ruby Ford and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a vigilante. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the freedom of Arya Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Eddard Stark, Arya Stark learnt the power of invisibility. In Oldstones at sunrise, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Jon Snow in The Trident. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Jon Snow. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the freedom and in Torrhen's Square celebrated with Rickon Stark by having a feast.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Garlan Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of mind controlling. In Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they formed an alliance. At Christmas Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost in The Eyrie, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the freedom was not under threat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Crossroads Inn by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Joffrey Baratheon to seek help. Joffrey Baratheon was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Raventree Hall at Night, Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Vale of Arryn at the Autumnal Equinox, Margaery Tyrell faced Petyr Baelish. story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Rhaella Targaryen to seek help. Rhaella Targaryen was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Eyrie at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq finally found Arya Stark in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Arya Stark. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq celebrated in The Iron Island by making fireworks.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of military strategy. During a long training session in The Whispering Wood at the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Deepwood Motte at sunrise, Petyr Baelish faced Margaery Tyrell. With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. After the victory, the treasure was not under threat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Deepwood Motte by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a murderer. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the House of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Lysa Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of invisibility. On the way to Raventree Hall at Christmas, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. At the Summer Solstice Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Deepwood Motte, when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in The Twins by having a feast.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an official. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the castle of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Euron Greyjoy, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of gravity Control. In Crossroads Inn at Night, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Iron Island at Night, Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon. With the help of Myrcella Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control, the alliance scared away Robert Baratheon. After the victory, the castle was not under threat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon celebrated in Karhold by watching a play.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a vigilante. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the House of Arya Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Sansa Stark, Arya Stark learnt the power of invisibility. In Kings Landing at the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in White Harbor at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the House and in Raventree Hall celebrated with Bran Stark by playing a game.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the House of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Eddard Stark to seek help. Eddard Stark was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at the first day of Spring, Bran Stark met Robb Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Winterfell at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark faced Petyr Baelish. With the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Petyr Baelish. Eventually the House was safe again. Bran Stark and Robb Stark went to Winterfell and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the House of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid but with the help of Loras Tyrell, got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Winterfell at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in Raventree Hall at Night, Margaery Tyrell faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Joffrey Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon celebrated in Saltpans by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rickard Stark, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of fire sorcery. On the way to Raventree Hall at the Autumnal Equinox, Daenerys Targaryen met Benjen Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Raventree Hall at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Benjen Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Benjen Stark went to Raventree Hall and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the castle of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Lysa Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of gravity Control. On the way to The Whispering Wood at the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Robert Arryn finally found Robert Baratheon in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to Seagard and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid but with the help of Joanna Lannister, got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Seagard at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the first day of Spring Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon were almost in Kings Landing, when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the peace and in The Vale of Arryn celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the House of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Cersei Lannister to seek help. Cersei Lannister was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. In Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they formed an alliance. Finally in Great Sept of Baelor at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen. With the help of Myrcella Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the House and in Castle Black celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by having a feast.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a regent. Cersei Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the castle of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Euron Greyjoy to seek help. Euron Greyjoy was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Red Keep at the Winter Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas Cersei Lannister and Tywin Lannister were almost in White Harbor, when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as an assassin. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the treasure of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid but with the help of Robb Stark, got stronger and learnt military strategy. In The Ruby Ford at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark went to Raventree Hall and celebrated by getting married.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Cersei Lannister. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Jaime Lannister, Cersei Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. In Crossroads Inn at sunrise, Cersei Lannister met Shae and they formed an alliance. At sunrise Cersei Lannister and Shae were almost in Karhold, when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Cersei Lannister and Shae celebrated in Saltpans by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Baratheon. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Tywin Lannister, Cersei Lannister learnt the power of fire sorcery. On the way to The Dreadfort at the Winter Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Lancel Lannister finally found Petyr Baelish in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the jewel and in Crossroads Inn celebrated with Lancel Lannister by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the jewel of Jon Snow. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen, Jon Snow learnt the power of fire sorcery. On the way to White Harbor at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen and they immediately became friends. At sunrise Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen were almost in The Vale of Arryn, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the jewel and in The Trident celebrated with Aegon Targaryen by having a feast.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Eddard Stark, got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Riverlands at sunrise, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice Bran Stark and Catelyn Stark were almost in Bear Island, when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the treasure and in Raventree Hall celebrated with Catelyn Stark by having a feast.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Catelyn Stark, got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in Seagard at the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister in Moat Cailin. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the jewel and in The Eyrie celebrated with Eddard Stark by playing a game.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened the castle of Bran Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rickon Stark, Bran Stark learnt the power of military strategy. In The Ruby Ford at Night, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. At Night Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in The Dreadfort, when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark went to The Iron Island and celebrated by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a procurer. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the House of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid but with the help of Lysa Arryn, got stronger and learnt teleportation. In Riverlands at Night, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they formed an alliance. Finally in Kings Landing at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish faced Margaery Tyrell. With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the House and in Torrhen's Square celebrated with Robert Arryn by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the House of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help. Tywin Lannister was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Torrhen's Square at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in Red Keep at Christmas, Tyrion Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell. With the help of Myrcella Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the House and in Deepwood Motte celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as an official. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the House of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Deepwood Motte at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Joanna Lannister finally found Bran Stark in Torrhen's Square. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the House and in Castle Black celebrated with Joanna Lannister by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a procurer. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the peace of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help. Robert Arryn was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Twins at the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Jon Snow in Karhold. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Jon Snow. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the peace and in The Ruby Ford celebrated with Lysa Arryn by playing a game.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Jaime Lannister to seek help. Jaime Lannister was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at the first day of Spring, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in Deepwood Motte, when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister went to The Ruby Ford and celebrated by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was an assassin whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Sansa Stark to seek help. Sansa Stark was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Torrhen's Square at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Deepwood Motte at Night, Arya Stark faced Jon Snow. With the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Jon Snow. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the jewel and in Winterfell celebrated with Bran Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the peace of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Alerie Tyrell to seek help. Alerie Tyrell was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Trident at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they formed an alliance. At Night Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost in Oldstones, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in The Trident by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the House of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid but with the help of Tommen Baratheon, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In The Trident at the first day of Spring, Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Twins at the Autumnal Equinox, Margaery Tyrell faced Arya Stark. With the help of Mace Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Arya Stark. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the House and in Great Sept of Baelor celebrated with Mace Tyrell by watching a play.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the castle of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Shae to seek help. Shae was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Whispering Wood at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they immediately became friends. At Christmas Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost in White Harbor, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister went to Karhold and celebrated by getting married.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a warrior. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the freedom of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Rickon Stark to seek help. Rickon Stark was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Riverlands at sunrise, Arya Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen. With the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy, the alliance scared away Daenerys Targaryen. After the victory, the freedom was not under threat anymore. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in The Trident by playing a game.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a military leader. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Cassana Baratheon to seek help. Cassana Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Twins at the first day of Spring, Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in Moat Cailin, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the peace was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Gendry went to White Harbor and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a hunter. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the treasure of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Gendry, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of military strategy. In Riverlands at the first day of Spring, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Renly Baratheon finally found Tyrion Lannister in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the treasure and in Kings Landing celebrated with Renly Baratheon by getting married.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the castle of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of mind controlling. During a long training session in Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Arya Stark in Raventree Hall. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Arya Stark. After the victory, the castle was not under threat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Torrhen's Square by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the House of Jon Snow. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq, Jon Snow learnt the power of gravity Control. On the way to Kings Landing at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow met Daenerys Targaryen and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen were almost in The Vale of Arryn, when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen celebrated in Great Sept of Baelor by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the House of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Euron Greyjoy to seek help. Euron Greyjoy was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Raventree Hall at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they immediately became friends. At Christmas Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in The Eyrie, when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in The Eyrie by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as an official. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Cersei Lannister, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of fire sorcery. In Castle Black at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in Red Keep at sunrise, Tyrion Lannister faced Bran Stark. With the help of Jaime Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery, the alliance scared away Bran Stark. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the freedom and in Riverlands celebrated with Jaime Lannister by watching a play.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the House of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Renly Baratheon, got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in Karhold at Christmas, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice Robert Baratheon and Edric Storm were almost in Moat Cailin, when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Edric Storm celebrated in Kings Landing by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid but with the help of Alerie Tyrell, got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in Crossroads Inn at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Garlan Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Garlan Tyrell finally found Arya Stark in Red Keep. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Arya Stark. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the peace and in Raventree Hall celebrated with Garlan Tyrell by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the freedom of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Sansa Stark to seek help. Sansa Stark was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Winterfell at sunrise, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. At sunrise Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in The Eyrie, when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the freedom and in Saltpans celebrated with Eddard Stark by having a feast.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the House of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon, got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. In The Whispering Wood at Night, Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Tommen Baratheon finally found Arya Stark in The Eyrie. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Arya Stark. Eventually the House was safe again. Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon went to Red Keep and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the treasure of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Rickon Stark, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at sunrise, Bran Stark met Arya Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Arya Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Raventree Hall. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Bran Stark and Arya Stark went to Karhold and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of fire sorcery. During a long training session in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell were almost in Kings Landing, when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell celebrated in Bear Island by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a squire whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Targaryen. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Lyanna Stark to seek help. Lyanna Stark was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Trident at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Rickard Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Rickard Stark finally found Arya Stark in The Ruby Ford. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Arya Stark. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Jon Snow and Rickard Stark celebrated in Raventree Hall by making fireworks.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a procurer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the House of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid but with the help of Robert Arryn, got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In The Ruby Ford at sunrise, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Bran Stark in Deepwood Motte. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Bran Stark. Eventually the House was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Crossroads Inn and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a prophet. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the House of Bran Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rickon Stark, Bran Stark learnt the power of military strategy. On the way to Karhold at the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they immediately became friends. At Christmas Bran Stark and Sansa Stark were almost in The Whispering Wood, when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the House and in Oldstones celebrated with Sansa Stark by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as an assassin. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the treasure of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid but with the help of Sansa Stark, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in The Eyrie at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. After the victory, the treasure was not under threat anymore. Arya Stark and Bran Stark celebrated in Winterfell by listening to a storytelling.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the castle of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Catelyn Stark to seek help. Catelyn Stark was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Dreadfort at the first day of Spring, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring Bran Stark and Eddard Stark were almost in Saltpans, when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the castle and in Bear Island celebrated with Eddard Stark by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men from the House Baratheon. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the treasure of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Renly Baratheon, got stronger and learnt invisibility. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at the Summer Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Gendry. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the first day of Spring Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in White Harbor, when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Gendry went to Karhold and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the peace of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid but with the help of Robert Arryn, got stronger and learnt invisibility. In Raventree Hall at sunrise, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Bran Stark in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Bran Stark. Eventually the peace was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Oldstones and celebrated by having a feast.

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, Lord from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a squire. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the freedom of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Rickard Stark to seek help. Rickard Stark was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Dreadfort at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen were almost in Winterfell, when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the freedom and in Crossroads Inn celebrated with Rhaegar Targaryen by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Mace Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of fire sorcery. During a long training session in The Twins at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Joffrey Baratheon finally found Jon Snow in Kings Landing. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Jon Snow. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the jewel and in Karhold celebrated with Joffrey Baratheon by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a hunter. Everything was quiet when one day Jon Snow threatened the castle of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Stannis Baratheon, got stronger and learnt teleportation. On the way to Riverlands at the first day of Spring, Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in Crossroads Inn, when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the castle and in Crossroads Inn celebrated with Gendry by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a hunter whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men from the House Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the treasure of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Stannis Baratheon to seek help. Stannis Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. In Castle Black at Christmas, Robert Baratheon met Renly Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon were almost in Raventree Hall, when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under threat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Renly Baratheon celebrated in Deepwood Motte by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the castle of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid but with the help of Lyarra Stark, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In Deepwood Motte at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Rickard Stark and they formed an alliance. At sunrise Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark were almost in Red Keep, when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark celebrated in Castle Black by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a rebel. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the jewel of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Gendry to seek help. Gendry was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Winterfell at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon and they immediately became friends. At Christmas Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon were almost in Bear Island, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon went to The Twins and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Catelyn Stark, got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In Raventree Hall at Night, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. At Christmas Bran Stark and Sansa Stark were almost in The Eyrie, when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Bran Stark and Sansa Stark went to Castle Black and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an assassin whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the castle of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid but with the help of Catelyn Stark, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at sunrise, Arya Stark met Robb Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice Arya Stark and Robb Stark were almost in Castle Black, when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under threat anymore. story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the jewel of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Lancel Lannister, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of invisibility. On the way to Oldstones at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Cersei Lannister finally found Bran Stark in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Bran Stark. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister celebrated in Saltpans by getting married.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Arya Stark, Bran Stark learnt the power of military strategy. On the way to The Twins at the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in Red Keep at Night, Bran Stark faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the peace and in The Whispering Wood celebrated with Sansa Stark by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the castle of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of teleportation. In The Whispering Wood at Night, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. Finally in Torrhen's Square at Night, Petyr Baelish faced Daenerys Targaryen. With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from the House Stark. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the freedom of Arya Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Eddard Stark, Arya Stark learnt the power of mind controlling. In The Twins at the first day of Spring, Arya Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Great Sept of Baelor at the first day of Spring, Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the freedom and in White Harbor celebrated with Sansa Stark by having a feast.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Sansa Stark, got stronger and learnt teleportation. In Karhold at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Arya Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Twins at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen. With the help of Arya Stark and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the jewel and in Riverlands celebrated with Arya Stark by making fireworks.

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the treasure of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Cassana Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of mind controlling. On the way to Winterfell at the Winter Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they immediately became friends. At the Autumnal Equinox Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in Bear Island, when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the treasure and in Red Keep celebrated with Gendry by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an official whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help. Tywin Lannister was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Bear Island at sunrise, Tyrion Lannister met Euron Greyjoy. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Euron Greyjoy finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Euron Greyjoy celebrated in The Eyrie by getting married.

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a rebel. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the peace of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Steffon Baratheon, got stronger and learnt teleportation. On the way to The Ruby Ford at the Summer Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Stannis Baratheon and they immediately became friends. Finally in White Harbor at the first day of Spring, Robert Baratheon faced Cersei Lannister. With the help of Stannis Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. Eventually the peace was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Stannis Baratheon went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a military leader. Everything was quiet when one day Margaery Tyrell threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Edric Storm, got stronger and learnt teleportation. On the way to Bear Island at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Steffon Baratheon finally found Margaery Tyrell in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon went to Red Keep and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a vigilante. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the peace of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid but with the help of Bran Stark, got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. On the way to Kings Landing at sunrise, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually the peace was safe again. Arya Stark and Rickon Stark went to Oldstones and celebrated by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the castle of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rhaegar Targaryen, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of mind controlling. On the way to Castle Black at sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen met Lyanna Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Lyanna Stark finally found Robert Baratheon in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the castle and in The Vale of Arryn celebrated with Lyanna Stark by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robb Stark, Bran Stark learnt the power of invisibility. During a long training session in Oldstones at sunrise, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Jon Snow in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Jon Snow. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark went to The Twins and celebrated by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid but with the help of Benjen Stark, got stronger and learnt teleportation. In The Whispering Wood at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq finally found Cersei Lannister in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq celebrated in Moat Cailin by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the freedom of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid but with the help of Robb Stark, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In Moat Cailin at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Rickon Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Rickon Stark finally found Cersei Lannister in The Eyrie. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the freedom and in The Twins celebrated with Rickon Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister. Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid but with the help of Tywin Lannister, got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to The Eyrie at sunrise, Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they immediately became friends. At the first day of Spring Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon were almost in The Trident, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the peace and in Oldstones celebrated with Myrcella Baratheon by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the jewel of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in White Harbor at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Tyrion Lannister with the help of Joanna Lannister finally found Petyr Baelish in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Tyrion Lannister thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in Torrhen's Square by getting married.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Robert Baratheon. Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid but with the help of Gendry, got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In The Iron Island at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Cassana Baratheon finally found Petyr Baelish in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the peace and in Deepwood Motte celebrated with Cassana Baratheon by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a revolutionary. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen, got stronger and learnt teleportation. During a long training session in Saltpans at sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen met Viserys Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night Daenerys Targaryen and Viserys Targaryen were almost in White Harbor, when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Daenerys Targaryen and Viserys Targaryen went to Crossroads Inn and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a mass murderer. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the treasure of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Robb Stark to seek help. Robb Stark was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Bran Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Twins at the Summer Solstice, Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell. With the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the treasure and in Bear Island celebrated with Bran Stark by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a procurer whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the castle of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help. Lysa Arryn was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Vale of Arryn at Christmas, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. Finally in Raventree Hall at the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish faced Jon Snow. With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery, the alliance scared away Jon Snow. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the castle and in White Harbor celebrated with Robert Arryn by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Rhaella Targaryen to seek help. Rhaella Targaryen was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Dreadfort at Christmas, Daenerys Targaryen met Lyanna Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen with the help of Lyanna Stark finally found Arya Stark in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Daenerys Targaryen thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Arya Stark. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Lyanna Stark celebrated in Bear Island by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Alerie Tyrell to seek help. Alerie Tyrell was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Torrhen's Square at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Ruby Ford at sunrise, Margaery Tyrell faced Bran Stark. With the help of Willas Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility, the alliance scared away Bran Stark. After the victory, the freedom was not under threat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Riverlands by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the treasure of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Benjen Stark to seek help. Benjen Stark was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. In Moat Cailin at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Hizdahr zo Loraq and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq finally found Petyr Baelish in Raventree Hall. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Jon Snow and Hizdahr zo Loraq went to The Trident and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially Daenerys Targaryen was afraid but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. In Crossroads Inn at Christmas, Daenerys Targaryen met Rickard Stark and they formed an alliance. At Christmas Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark were almost in Seagard, when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark celebrated in Crossroads Inn by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid but with the help of Willas Tyrell, got stronger and learnt mind controlling. On the way to The Trident at the first day of Spring, Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Tommen Baratheon finally found Daenerys Targaryen in The Trident. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the freedom and in White Harbor celebrated with Tommen Baratheon by listening to a storytelling.

story: Once upon a time, there was a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to the peace of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of fire sorcery. During a long training session in Seagard at the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Saltpans at the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish faced Arya Stark. With the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery, the alliance scared away Arya Stark. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the peace and in Karhold celebrated with Lysa Arryn by listening to a storytelling.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Cersei Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the freedom of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Joanna Lannister to seek help. Joanna Lannister was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Oldstones at sunrise, Cersei Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Tywin Lannister finally found Robert Baratheon in Karhold. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to Oldstones and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the House of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Joffrey Baratheon to seek help. Joffrey Baratheon was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Oldstones at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Alerie Tyrell finally found Bran Stark in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the House and in Raventree Hall celebrated with Alerie Tyrell by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was an advisor whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Baratheon. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the treasure of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help. Tywin Lannister was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Deepwood Motte at the Winter Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice Cersei Lannister and Lancel Lannister were almost in The Trident, when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the treasure and in The Iron Island celebrated with Lancel Lannister by making fireworks.
